org.fluidity.deployment.osgi

Annotation Type Service


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=PARAMETER)
 @Qualifier(value=IMMEDIATE)
public @interface Service
    Annotates method parameters of a BundleComponents.Managed component that require an OSGi service instance to resolve. Parameters not so annotated are resolved from the in-bundle dependency injection container(s). See BundleComponents for details on managed components.

    This annotation applies to constructor parameters but not to fields as a component that depends on OSGi services is not expected to be instantiated until all of its constructor parameters annotated with this type have been registered in the OSGi service registry.

    An OSGi service referenced as a Java interface will be able to see classes in the local OSGi bundle as well as the bundle that exports it.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Class<?> api
      Returns the service interface under which the required OSGi service is expected to have been registered.
      String filter
      Returns the filter that narrows down the list of possible service implementation candidates.

    • Element Detail

      • api

        public abstract Class<?> api
        Returns the service interface under which the required OSGi service is expected to have been registered. When not specified, the service interface defaults to the type of the annotated dependency reference.
        Returns:
        the service interface under which the required OSGi service is expected to have been registered.
        Default:
        java.lang.Object.class

      • filter

        public abstract String filter
        Returns the filter that narrows down the list of possible service implementation candidates.
        Returns:
        the filter that narrows down the list of possible service implementation candidates.
        Default:
        ""
